languages.text: {n}Кассия, завороженно ловящая каждое слово историка, возмущенно шикает на Идиру.{/n}
{n}Cassia, who has been listening to the historian's every word with bated breath, shushes Idira indignantly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия, завороженно ловящая каждое слово историка, возмущенно шикает на Идиру.{/n}

languages.text: {n}息をひそめて歴史家の一語一句に傾聴していたカシアが、イディラへと怒りとともにシッ！と黙るように合図する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia, who has been listening to the historian's every word with bated breath, shushes Idira indignantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}息をひそめて歴史家の一語一句に傾聴していたカシアが、イディラへと怒りとともにシッ！と黙るように合図する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia, pendue aux lèvres de l'historien depuis le début de son récit, fait un signe indigné à Idira pour lui demander de se taire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia, who has been listening to the historian's every word with bated breath, shushes Idira indignantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, pendue aux lèvres de l'historien depuis le début de son récit, fait un signe indigné à Idira pour lui demander de se taire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡西娅一直屏息凝神，认认真真地聆听着戈尔代的一字一句。此刻，她忿忿不平地推开了伊迪拉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia, who has been listening to the historian's every word with bated breath, shushes Idira indignantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅一直屏息凝神，认认真真地聆听着戈尔代的一字一句。此刻，她忿忿不平地推开了伊迪拉。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia, die jedes Wort des Historikers mit angehaltenem Atem verfolgt hat, bedeutet Idira ungeduldig, zu schweigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia, who has been listening to the historian's every word with bated breath, shushes Idira indignantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {/n}Cassia, die jedes Wort des Historikers mit angehaltenem Atem verfolgt hat, bedeutet Idira ungeduldig, zu schweigen.{n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia, quien ha estado escuchando cada palabra del historiador con la respiración contenida, hace callar a Idira indignada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia, who has been listening to the historian's every word with bated breath, shushes Idira indignantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, quien ha estado escuchando cada palabra del historiador con la respiración contenida, hace callar a Idira indignada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tarihçinin her sözünü nefesini tutmuş dinleyen Cassia, öfkeyle İdira'yı susturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia, who has been listening to the historian's every word with bated breath, shushes Idira indignantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tarihçinin her sözünü soluk soluğa sabırsızlıkla dinleyen Cassia, öfkeyle İdira'yı susturuyor.{/n}
